Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Observational \Ob`ser*va"tion*al\, a. Of or pertaining to observation; consisting of, or containing, observations. --Chalmers. [1913 Webster]
observational adj : relying on observation or experiment; "experimental results that supported the hypothesis" [syn: {experimental}, {data-based}]
